Self.Wiki: Determines various parameters related to game systems and the player.

BaseToughnessRecoverTime.Wiki: The base recovery rate of toughness. In seconds.

ChrEventTrun_byLeft90.Wiki: The animation ID to use for the specified character rotation.

ChrEventTrun_byRight90.Wiki: The animation ID to use for the specified character rotation.

ChrEventTrun_byLeft180.Wiki: The animation ID to use for the specified character rotation.

ChrEventTrun_byRight180.Wiki: The animation ID to use for the specified character rotation.

ChrEventTrun_90TurnStartAngle.Wiki: The starting angle for the specified character rotation when it is applied. If the event starts at an angle smaller than this angle, a system turn will occur.

ChrEventTrun_180TurnStartAngle.Wiki: The starting angle for the specified character rotation when it is applied. If the event starts at an angle smaller than this angle, a system turn will occur.

DeptDeceasedItemId.Wiki: The item ID of the item that determines debt level. If less than 0, the debt will not be treasted as an invalid value.

FlickDamageCutRateSuccessGurad.AltName: Damage Absorption upon Successful Guard Repel
FlickDamageCutRateSuccessGurad.Wiki: The damage absorption multiplier to use when a guard action successfully repels a weapon.

NpcTalkAnimBeginDiffAngle.Wiki: The difference angle between the NPC and the player at which a NPC conversation animation will start to occur.

NpcTalkAnimEndDiffAngle.Wiki: The difference angle between the NPC and the player at which a NPC conversation animation will stop occuring.

CultDeadSpEffectId_Optional.Wiki: The SpEffect ID to turn an enemy corpse into a ritual corpse.

CultDeadSpEffectId_LevelUp.Wiki: The SpEffect ID given when using the level-up menu at a ritual corpse.

CultDeadSpEffectId_StatusReroll.AltName: Ritual Corpse: SpEffect ID - Attribute Reallocation
CultDeadSpEffectId_StatusReroll.Wiki: The SpEffect ID given when using the attribute reallocation menu at a ritual corpse.

CultDeadSpEffectId_DeadLevelReset.AltName: Ritual Corpse: SpEffect ID - Hollowing Reset
CultDeadSpEffectId_DeadLevelReset.Wiki: The SpEffect ID given when using the hollowing reset menu at a ritual corpse.

CultDeadSpEffectId_Atonement.Wiki: The SpEffect ID given when using the sin atonement menu at a ritual corpse.

CultDeadSpEffectId_NpcWhiteGhost.AltName: Ritual Corpse: SpEffect ID - Spirit Summon
CultDeadSpEffectId_NpcWhiteGhost.Wiki: The SpEffect ID given when using the spirit summon menu at a ritual corpse.

CultDeadSpEffectId_Bomb.Wiki: The SpEffect ID given when using the bomb action at a ritual corpse.

CultDeadSpEffectId_NoInvasion.AltName: Ritual Corpse: SpEffect ID - Block Invasion
CultDeadSpEffectId_NoInvasion.Wiki: The SpEffect ID given when using the block invasion action at a ritual corpse.

CultSwordItemId_LevelUp.Wiki: The SpEffect ID for the level-up menu with a ritual sword.

CultSwordItemId_StatusReroll.AltName: Ritual Sword: SpEffect ID - Attribute Reallocation
CultSwordItemId_StatusReroll.Wiki: The SpEffect ID for the attribute reallocation menu with a ritual sword.

CultSwordItemId_DeadLevelReset.AltName: Ritual Sword: SpEffect ID - Hollowing Reset
CultSwordItemId_DeadLevelReset.Wiki: The SpEffect ID for the hollowing reset menu with a ritual sword.

CultSwordItemId_Atonement.Wiki: The SpEffect ID for the sin atonement menu with a ritual sword.

CultSwordItemId_NpcWhiteGhost.AltName: Ritual Sword: SpEffect ID - Spirit Summon
CultSwordItemId_NpcWhiteGhost.Wiki: The SpEffect ID for the spirit summon menu with a ritual sword.

CultSwordItemId_Bomb.Wiki: The SpEffect ID for the bomb action with a ritual sword.

CultSwordItemId_NoInvasion.AltName: Ritual Sword: SpEffect ID - Block Invasion
CultSwordItemId_NoInvasion.Wiki: The SpEffect ID for the block invasion action with a ritual sword.

ImpossibleCultDialogId_LevelUp.Wiki: The dialogue ID to use when using the level-up action with a ritual implement.

ImpossibleCultDialogId_StatusReroll.AltName: Ritual Action: Dialog ID - Attribute Reallocation
ImpossibleCultDialogId_StatusReroll.Wiki: The dialogue ID to use when using the attribute reallocation action with a ritual implement.

ImpossibleCultDialogId_DeadLevelReset.AltName: Ritual Action: Dialog ID - Hollowing Reset
ImpossibleCultDialogId_DeadLevelReset.Wiki: The dialogue ID to use when using the hollowing reset action with a ritual implement.

ImpossibleCultDialogId_Atonement.Wiki: The dialogue ID to use when using the atonement action with a ritual implement.

ImpossibleCultDialogId_NpcWhiteGhost_Max.AltName: Ritual Action: Dialog ID - Spirit Summon (No Slots)
ImpossibleCultDialogId_NpcWhiteGhost_Max.Wiki: The dialogue ID to use when using the spirit summon action with a ritual implement, with no available summon slots.

ImpossibleCultDialogId_NpcWhiteGhost_Are.AltName: Ritual Action: Dialog ID - Spirit Summon (Outside Area)
ImpossibleCultDialogId_NpcWhiteGhost_Are.Wiki: The dialogue ID to use when using the spirit summon action with a ritual implement, when outside of the summoning area.

ImpossibleCultDialogId_NpcWhiteGhost_Are.AltName: Ritual Action: Dialog ID - Spirit Summon (Area Clear)
ImpossibleCultDialogId_NpcWhiteGhost_Are.Wiki: The dialogue ID to use when using the spirit summon action with a ritual implement, when an area is cleared.

ImpossibleCultDialogId_Bomb.Wiki: The dialogue ID to use when using the bomb action with a ritual implement.

ImpossibleCultDialogId_NoInvasion.AltName: Ritual Action: Dialog ID - Block Invasion
ImpossibleCultDialogId_NoInvasion.Wiki: The dialogue ID to use when using the block invasion action with a ritual implement.

AcquittalTargetNpcEventFlagId.Wiki: The event flag ID to hold whether a NPC has forgotten a player's sin.

ActiveCultAtonementEventFlagId.Wiki: The event flag ID to hold whether the player has performed the atonement ritual.

RecoverBelowMaxHpCompletionNoticeSpEffec.AltName: Notification SpEffect ID: Recovery when HP is below Max
RecoverBelowMaxHpCompletionNoticeSpEffec.Wiki: The notification SpEffect ID to use when the 'Recovery when HP is below maximum' SpEffect is completed.

EstusFlaskRecovery_AbsorptionProductionS.Wiki: The absorption SFX ID to use when a HP flask is gained.
The absorption SFX ID to use when a MP flask is gained.

RespawnSpecialEffectActiveCheckerSpEffec.Wiki: The notification SpEffect ID to use when the 'Resurrection' SpEffect is completed. Mainly used for multiplayer sync.

DefeatHostilityGhostOfSoulCorrectRate_by.Wiki: The soul absorption multiplier to use when defeating an intruder as the host.
The soul absorption multiplier to use when defeating an intruder as a client.

DefeatMultiModeEnemyOfSoulCorrectRate_by.Wiki: The soul absorption multiplier to use when defeating an enemy as the host in a multiplayer session.
The soul absorption multiplier to use when defeating an enemy as a client in a multiplayer session.

DefeatMultiModeBossOfSoulCorrectRate_byH.Wiki: The soul absorption multiplier to use when defeating a boss as the host in a multiplayer session.

DefeatMultiModeBossOfSoulCorrectRate_byT.Wiki: The soul absorption multiplier to use when defeating a boss as a client in a multiplayer session.

EnemyHpGaugeScreenOffset_byUp.Wiki: The offset value in pixels for screen adjustments if the enemy HP gauge covers the entire screen (FullHD standard).

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_ShootBulletDummyp.AltName: Enemy Detection: Bullet Dummy Polygon ID
EnemyDetectionSpEffect_ShootBulletDummyp.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to use for the emitted bullet from the enemy detection SpEffect.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_MaxDetectionNum.Wiki: The maximum number of enemies that can be detected at once by the enemy detection SpEffect.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_MaxDetectionLengt.Wiki: The maximum distance at which enemies can be detected at once by the enemy detection SpEffect.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byCoopHo.AltName: Enemy Detection: Bullet ID - Co-operator Sign (Default)
EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byCoopHo.Wiki: The detection bullet ID to use for this specified type.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byCoopSi.Wiki: The detection bullet ID to use for this specified type.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byCoopSi.Wiki: The detection bullet ID to use for this specified type.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byCoopSi.Wiki: The detection bullet ID to use for this specified type.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byInvade.Wiki: The detection bullet ID to use for this specified type.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byInvade.Wiki: The detection bullet ID to use for this specified type.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byInvade.Wiki: The detection bullet ID to use for this specified type.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byInvade.AltName: Enemy Detection: Bullet ID - Intruder Ring (Sinner Covenant)
EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byInvade.Wiki: The detection bullet ID to use for this specified type.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byInvade.AltName: Enemy Detection: Bullet ID - Intruder Ring (Boss: Forest Covenant)
EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byInvade.Wiki: The detection bullet ID to use for this specified type.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byInvade.AltName: Enemy Detection: Bullet ID - Intruder Ring (Map: Forest Covenant)
EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byInvade.Wiki: The detection bullet ID to use for this specified type.

ActivityOfDeadSpEffect_BulletId.Wiki: The bullet ID to use for the Dead Again SpEffect.

ActivityOfDeadSpEffect_ShootBulletDummyp.AltName: Dead Again SpEffect: Bullet Dummy Polygon ID
ActivityOfDeadSpEffect_ShootBulletDummyp.Wiki: The dummy polygon ID to use for the emitted bullet from the Dead Again SpEffect.

ActivityOfDeadSpEffect_DeadFadeOutTime.AltName: Dead Again SpEffect: Fade Out Time
ActivityOfDeadSpEffect_DeadFadeOutTime.Wiki: The fade out time for dead enemies affected by the Dead Again SpEffect.

IgnorNetStateSyncTime_ForThrow.AltName: Network: Transition Ignore Time at Throw Start
IgnorNetStateSyncTime_ForThrow.Wiki: The time to ignore transitions at throw start due to network information.

NetPenaltyPointLanDisconnect.Wiki: The penalty points to apply for a client after LAN disconnection.

NetPenaltyPointProfileSignout.AltName: Network: Multiplayer Penalty - Profile Sign Out
NetPenaltyPointProfileSignout.Wiki: The penalty points to apply for a client after profile sign out.

NetPenaltyPointReboot.Wiki: The penalty points to apply for a client after reboot.

NetPnaltyPointSuspend.Wiki: The penalty points to apply for a client after suspend.

NetPenaltyForgiveItemLimitTime.AltName: Network: Multiplayer Penalty - Item Forgiveness Time
NetPenaltyForgiveItemLimitTime.Wiki: The item forgiveness duration after incurring a multiplayer penalty.

NetPenaltyPointThreshold.Wiki: The threshold at which a multiplayer penalty is incurred.

UncontrolledMoveThresholdTime.Wiki: The duration after which no actions have occured the player will be kicked from the multiplayer session. In seconds.

EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byNpcEne.AltName: Enemy Detection: Bullet ID - NPC Enemy
EnemyDetectionSpEffect_BulletId_byNpcEne.Wiki: The detection bullet ID to use for this specified type.

ActivityOfDeadTargetSearchSpEffect_OnHit.AltName: Dead Again SpEffect: Active Target Search
ActivityOfDeadTargetSearchSpEffect_OnHit.Wiki: The SpEffect ID applied during the active target search effect of Dead Again.

ActivityOfDeadTargetSearchSpEffect_MaxLe.AltName: Dead Again SpEffect: Active Target Search Distance
ActivityOfDeadTargetSearchSpEffect_MaxLe.Wiki: The maximum distance for the active target search effect of Dead Again.

NetFpsCheck_fpsThreshold.Wiki: The low FPS threshold at which a player is kicked from a multiplayer session.

NetFpsCheck_lowfpsTImeThreshold.Wiki: The duration at which the low FPS threshold is met, after which a player will be kicked from a multiplayer session.

SoloBreakInMaxPoint.Wiki: The maximum points for solo intruder entry. If this value is exceeded, the host is invaded by a solo player.

NpcTalkTimeOutThreshold.Wiki: The timeout duration for voice playback during NPC conversations. If this timeout is reached, the next talk message occurs.

SendPlayLogIntervalTime.Wiki: The interval at which the play logging is sent to the server.

Item370_MaxSfxNum.Wiki: The maximum number of SFX that can originate from the Prism Stone item.

SummonDataCoopMatchingLevelUpperAbs.Wiki: The matching correction factor applied during multiplier, based on the specified factor.

SummonDataCoopMatchingLevelUpperRel.Wiki: The matching correction factor applied during multiplier, based on the specified factor.

SummonDataCoopMatchingWepLevelMul.Wiki: The matching correction factor applied during multiplier, based on the specified factor.

PickUpBerserkerSignSpEffectBulletId.Wiki: The bullet ID to use when generating the SpEffect bullet at the sign position.

SucceedBerserkerSelfKillingEffectId.Wiki: The SpEffect to apply when the berserker kills the host by themselves.

MachingLevelWhiteSignUpperRel.AltName: Level Sync: Relative Soul Level Coefficient (Friendly Phantom)
MachingLevelWhiteSignUpperRel.Wiki: The soul level coefficient to use when determining whether to apply level synchronization with friendly phantoms.

MachingLevelWhiteSignUpperAbs.AltName: Level Sync: Absolute Soul Level Coefficient (Friendly Phantom)
MachingLevelWhiteSignUpperAbs.Wiki: The soul level coefficient to use when determining whether to apply level synchronization with friendly phantoms.

MachingLevelRedSignUpperRel.Wiki: The soul level coefficient to use when determining whether to apply level synchronization with hostile phantoms.

MachingLevelRedSignUpperAbs.AltName: Level Sync: Absolute Soul Level Coefficient (Hostile Phantom)
MachingLevelRedSignUpperAbs.Wiki: The soul level coefficient to use when determining whether to apply level synchronization with hostile phantoms.

MachingWeaponLevelUpperWhiteSign_0.Wiki: The maximum weapon reinforcement level factor to use when determining whether to apply level synchronization with friendly phantoms.

SendGlobalEventLogIntervalTime.Wiki: The interval at which to send the global event log to the server.

AddSoloBreakInPoint_White.AltName: Intruder Entry Point: Addition Value (White Phantom)
AddSoloBreakInPoint_White.Wiki: The addition value to apply for intruder entry for intruders of this type into the host's world.

AddSoloBreakInPoint_Black.AltName: Intruder Entry Point: Addition Value (Red Phantom)
AddSoloBreakInPoint_Black.Wiki: The addition value to apply for intruder entry for intruders of this type into the host's world.

AddSoloBreakInPoint_VisitorGuardian.Wiki: The addition value to apply for intruder entry for intruders of this type into the host's world.

AddSoloBreakInPoint_VisitorRedHunter.AltName: Intruder Entry Point: Addition Value (Visitor: Red Hunter)
AddSoloBreakInPoint_VisitorRedHunter.Wiki: The addition value to apply for intruder entry for intruders of this type into the host's world.

CorpseRedrawingDistance.Wiki: The distance at which a corpse will be marked to not be redrawn, even if it comes within draw distance again.
